definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: The mouse moves the pointer or cursor on the computer screen.
sentences.chinese: 将光标放在要添加新图框的位置，然后单击鼠标。

sentences.english: While they are visible, they move with the cursor.
sentences.chinese: 可见时，这类工具提示可以随光标移动。

sentences.english: " text string to the active document at the current cursor location.
sentences.chinese: 文本字符串传递到活动文档中光标当前所在的位置。

sentences.english: Use cursor hinting to indicate pliancy.
sentences.chinese: 运用光标暗示来表达受范性。

sentences.english: The temperature change is displayed by the deflection degree of cursor of galvanometer.
sentences.chinese: 通过灵敏电流计光标的偏转角度显示温度的变化。

sentences.english: If you want to use the direct cursor, then disable the AutoCorrect tool.
sentences.chinese: 如果要使用直接定位光标，则需要禁用自动更正工具。

sentences.english: The current cursor location must be saved first.
sentences.chinese: 必须首先保存当前的光标位置。

sentences.english: Movable splitters should always advertise their pliancy with cursor hinting.
sentences.chinese: 可移动的分割线应该借助光标暗示显示其受范性。

sentences.english: When the cursor is hovering over a launcher, a pin icon will appear in the top right-hand corner.
sentences.chinese: 当光标指向启动项时，右上角会出现一个大头针图标。

sentences.english: Used for "cursor" when it needs to be distinguished from "line cursor".
sentences.chinese: 文本光标，用来同“行光标”作区分。

sentences.english: Used for "cursor" when it needs to be distinguished from "line cursor".
sentences.chinese: 文本光标，用来同“行光标”作区分。

sentences.english: You can use this to navigate directly to the browser address bar of firefox.
sentences.chinese: 你可以使用该快捷键直接把光标转到火狐的地址栏。

sentences.english: You can insert WordArt into a document at the current cursor location.
sentences.chinese: 可以在当前的光标位置将艺术字插入文档。

sentences.english: And a cursor around the target tells us he did it correctly.
sentences.chinese: 通过光标和目标点我们能够确定猴子做对了。

sentences.english: Would you like to customize your flick gestures?
sentences.chinese: 你想要自定义您的光标笔势吗？

sentences.english: According to commentary on the video, Chen stayed in the bucket for about30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 根据视频解说，陈光标在大垃圾桶内呆了有30分钟。

definition: blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
